cat.definition: A small furry animal that says meow and loves to nap

dog.definition: A friendly animal that says woof and loves to play fetch

monkey.definition: A playful animal that swings from trees and eats bananas

lion.definition: A big cat with a fluffy mane who is king of the jungle

tiger.definition: An orange cat with black stripes who lives in the forest

cow.definition: A farm animal that says moo and gives us milk

pig.definition: A pink farm animal that says oink and loves mud

frog.definition: A green animal that says ribbit and jumps in ponds

bird.definition: An animal with wings and feathers that can fly

chicken.definition: A farm bird that clucks and lays eggs

penguin.definition: A black and white bird that waddles and loves cold weather

fish.definition: An animal that swims in water and breathes through gills

whale.definition: The biggest animal in the ocean that sprays water from its head

dolphin.definition: A friendly ocean animal that jumps and plays in waves

butterfly.definition: A pretty insect with colorful wings

bee.definition: A buzzy insect that makes honey and helps flowers grow

bug.definition: A small crawly creature with lots of legs

snail.definition: A slow creature that carries its house on its back

turtle.definition: An animal with a hard shell on its back that moves slowly

snake.definition: A long animal with no legs that slithers on the ground

rabbit.definition: A soft fluffy animal with long ears that hops around

mouse.definition: A tiny animal with big ears that squeaks

hamster.definition: A small fluffy pet that stores food in its cheeks

bear.definition: A big furry animal that loves honey and sleeps all winter

panda.definition: A black and white bear that eats bamboo

koala.definition: A fuzzy animal from Australia that sleeps in trees

elephant.definition: A very big gray animal with a long trunk and big ears

horse.definition: A strong animal you can ride that says neigh

unicorn.definition: A magical horse with a rainbow horn on its head

fox.definition: A clever orange animal with a fluffy tail

owl.definition: A wise bird with big eyes that hoots at night

duck.definition: A bird that quacks and swims in ponds

dinosaur.definition: A very big animal that lived long long ago

trex.definition: A big scary dinosaur with tiny arms and sharp teeth

octopus.definition: A sea creature with eight wiggly arms

crab.definition: A sea creature that walks sideways and has pinchy claws

ladybug.definition: A tiny red bug with black spots that brings good luck

tree.definition: A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves

flower.definition: A pretty plant with colorful petals

rose.definition: A beautiful flower that smells sweet and has thorns

sunflower.definition: A big yellow flower that turns to face the sun

rainbow.definition: Colorful stripes in the sky that appear after rain

sun.definition: The big bright ball in the sky that gives us light and warmth

moon.definition: The round light we see in the night sky

star.definition: A tiny sparkly light in the night sky very far away

cloud.definition: White fluffy shapes in the sky made of tiny water drops

fire.definition: Hot bright flames that give light and heat

water.definition: The liquid we drink and swim in

apple.definition: A round red or green fruit that grows on trees

banana.definition: A yellow fruit that you peel before eating

orange.definition: A round orange fruit full of juice

lemon.definition: A sour yellow fruit used to make lemonade

grape.definition: Small round fruits that grow in bunches

strawberry.definition: A sweet red fruit with tiny seeds on the outside

cherry.definition: Small red fruits that grow in pairs

peach.definition: A soft fuzzy fruit that is orange and pink

pineapple.definition: A spiky tropical fruit that is sweet inside

watermelon.definition: A big green fruit that is red and juicy inside

carrot.definition: An orange vegetable that grows underground

corn.definition: A yellow vegetable with rows of kernels

pizza.definition: A flat round food with cheese and toppings

burger.definition: A sandwich with meat and toppings in a round bun

hotdog.definition: A sausage in a long bun

taco.definition: A folded shell filled with yummy things

cake.definition: A sweet treat often served at birthday parties

cookie.definition: A small flat sweet treat that is yummy to eat

donut.definition: A round sweet treat with a hole in the middle

icecream.definition: A cold sweet treat that comes in many flavors

candy.definition: Sweet treats that come in many colors and flavors

ball.definition: A round toy you can throw, kick, or bounce

balloon.definition: A colorful floaty toy filled with air

gift.definition: A wrapped present you give to someone special

book.definition: Pages with words and pictures you can read

pencil.definition: A tool for writing and drawing

crayon.definition: A colorful stick for drawing pictures

paint.definition: Colorful liquid you use to make art

music.definition: Pretty sounds that make you want to dance or sing

bell.definition: A thing that makes a ringing sound

key.definition: A metal thing that opens locks

crown.definition: A fancy hat worn by kings and queens

ring.definition: A circle of metal you wear on your finger

rocket.definition: A machine that flies up to space

car.definition: A machine with wheels that drives on roads

train.definition: A long machine that rides on tracks and goes choo choo

airplane.definition: A machine with wings that flies through the sky

boat.definition: A thing that floats on water and takes you places

bike.definition: A thing with two wheels that you pedal

sparkle.definition: A tiny flash of light that shimmers

checkmark.definition: A mark that means yes or correct

cross.definition: A mark that means no or wrong

question.definition: A mark that means you want to know something

exclaim.definition: A mark that means something important or exciting

plus.definition: A math sign that means adding things together

minus.definition: A math sign that means taking things away

multiply.definition: A math sign that means groups of the same number

divide.definition: A math sign that means splitting into equal parts

arrow.definition: A shape that points to show direction

smile.definition: A happy face with a nice grin

laugh.definition: When something is so funny you make sounds

love.definition: A warm feeling when you care about someone very much

think.definition: Using your brain to figure something out

party.definition: A fun time with friends and celebration

wink.definition: Closing one eye in a playful way

thumbsup.definition: A hand sign that means good job or yes

thumbsdown.definition: A hand sign that means no or not good

clap.definition: Hitting your hands together to show you like something

wave.definition: Moving your hand to say hello or goodbye

point.definition: Using your finger to show where something is

ok.definition: A hand sign that means everything is good

peace.definition: A hand sign with two fingers that means calm and friendly

dragon.definition: A magical creature that can breathe fire

rain.definition: Water drops that fall from clouds

snow.definition: Soft white ice that falls from the sky when it is cold

ocean.definition: A very big area of salty water where fish and whales live

mountain.definition: A very tall hill made of rock

forest.definition: A place with lots and lots of trees

sad.definition: Feeling down or unhappy, like when you want to cry

angry.definition: A hot feeling when something makes you upset

scared.definition: A shaky feeling when something frightens you

brave.definition: Being strong even when you feel scared

kind.definition: Being nice and helpful to others

friend.definition: Someone you like to play with and share things with

art.definition: Pictures and drawings you make with colors

times.definition: A math word that means groups of the same number

equals.definition: A math word that shows what the answer is
